answers.answer: Hi there!Well, without a detailed clinical evaluation it would be difficult to determine the cause of your symptoms. Possibilities that may need to be considered include dietary causes, GI infections/ inflammations, GI motility issues, non-GI causes such as hormonal/ endocrine issues, renal issues etc. The symptoms are unlikely to be related to the endoscopy. I would suggest getting this evaluated by a primary physician initially and depending on the cause diagnosed/ suspected, it can be managed accordingly or specialist care may be sought.Hope this is helpful.Take care!
